task: Derive downstream management artifacts from SYSTEM_SPEC
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §1.1. Artifacts derive strictly from spec; no code changes.

task: Fill in Auth Flows details (login/refresh/logout) to match implementation
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.1. Replace placeholders with authoritative behavior (no code changes). Aligned §3.1 auth flows to implementation. Merged PR #42 (038bff3e) at 2026-02-10T07:15:06Z
verification_commands: Doc review: confirm matches current behavior

task: Fill in CSRF policy details (token source/cookie/header/protected endpoints)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.2 (see SECURITY_CSRF). Must be canonical + precise.

task: Define Session Guarantees and non-guarantees
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.3. Already fully specified: token lifecycle (HS256 access, opaque refresh, HMAC CSRF), TTLs (access 7d, refresh 7d, CSRF 1h), rotation, logout, persistence, server-side session model, non-guarantees (§3.3.2).

task: Define Frozen vs Flexible areas in spec
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.4. Already fully specified: frozen items (auth contract, CSRF header/cookie, migration approval, per-request audit, SPA fallback), flexible areas (token TTLs, rate limits, deny list backend, session cleanup, OAuth config, error messages).

task: Define Testing determinism requirements (time/email/rate-limiting)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §5.1. Specify deterministic test rules; no external calls in tests.

task: Define 'green CI' guarantees + mocking boundaries
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §5.2. Document what tests may/must not mock.

task: Define development rules (branching/merge/commit discipline)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.1. Document workflow rules only.

task: Define deployment rules (approvals/rollback expectations)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.2. Document guardrails; deploy/migrate separation preserved.

task: Define migration rules (approvals required; no implicit migrations)
notes: Defined migration rules: approvals required; no implicit migrations; staging-only unless explicitly approved.

task: Define roadmap unlock criteria (NEXT-003 + production launch)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §7.2 and §4.4. Clarify what unlocks future work without implementing it.

task: Define change control process (who may edit/review/versioning)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §8.1. Define update authority and review requirements.

task: Publish MVP pages & routes checklist (no code scaffolding)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §2.5. Full audit: 72 routes catalogued (42 implemented, 14 scaffold, 16 redirects). Canonical auth, onboarding, app pages all documented with real component paths.

task: Define onboarding gate rules (cannot skip onboarding)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §2.5.7 (lines 166-177). Already normative: linear flow enforced, no skip, App routes redirect to onboarding, gate applies to deep links. Implemented in RequireOnboarding.tsx guard.

task: Establish Postgres MVP data scope as system-of-record
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §2.6. Scope and exclusions are authoritative.

task: Publish DB migrations playbook (approval gate; no manual prod changes)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §2.6.3 and §6.3. Playbook verified against current implementation: 32 migration files, RUN_DB_MIGRATIONS_ON_STARTUP=False default, Make targets documented.

task: Document DB observability/maintenance expectations (health/logging/backups/local reset)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §2.6.5. Expanded with health endpoints, pool config, logging, backup/restore, local reset, Heroku ops.

task: Execute PayFast production transaction
notes: Unblocked 2026-02-15. Preconditions met per PLAYBOOK_NEXT_003_UNBLOCK.md. Activating feature flag and running live R5 verification.

task: Maintain payments intent-only scope (no implementation in MVP)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §4 (Intent Only). Ensure plans/playbooks do not introduce execution work.

task: Publish auth changes playbook (guardrails for auth/csrf edits)

task: Publish release & deploy playbook (deploy rules + rollback)
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §6.2 and §6.3. Full playbook: environments, procedures, safety mechanisms, rollback, audit trail.

task: Perform management freeze review and publish results
notes: Spec: SYSTEM_SPEC §3.4, §2.5, §2.6, §4.4. Full refresh: NEXT-003 unblocked (in-progress), OAuth evidence, CSRF discrepancy noted, dual onboarding risk, 5 risks documented.

task: Repo hygiene: declutter autorisen (gitignore + cleanup tools + evidence policy) + clean docs/project-plan.csv formatting
notes: Consolidated .gitignore (408→315 lines, 37 dupes removed). Enhanced scripts/clean.sh (flags: --dry-run/--python/--node/--branches/--all). Updated docs/REPO_HYGIENE.md with policy + metrics. Removed tracked package-lock.json. Pruned 15 stale merged branches. Repo audit: 659MB total (tracked content lean; .git/venv/node_modules are bulk).

task: Dashboard: project status returns non-null value
notes: PR #51 code merged to main (endpoint /projects/status active). Backend returns non-null value with ProjectStatusSummary schema. Frontend ProjectStatusModule renders value badge. Dashboard widget work (FEAT-DASH-WELCOME-001) further improved dashboard.
verification_commands: ./.venv/bin/python -m pytest -q; pnpm -C client install --frozen-lockfile; pnpm -C client run build

task: Create 4 AI agent modules (code-review/security-scan/perf-opt/doc-gen) + wire into router
notes: Added CodeReviewAgent, SecurityScanAgent, PerformanceOptAgent, DocGenAgent under backend/src/modules/agents/. Wired into app factory and agent executor. Commit b2eeb38a.

task: Align payment plans to Free/Pro/Enterprise with ZAR pricing
notes: Updated PricingPage and backend plan definitions. Free/$0, Pro/R29, Enterprise/R99. Commit b2eeb38a.

task: Fix landing page CTAs and feature promises
notes: Updated Home.tsx feature sections and CTA buttons to match actual platform capabilities. Commit b2eeb38a.
verification_commands: Manual review: landing page content matches features

task: Activate Google and LinkedIn OAuth login (end-to-end)
notes: Implemented real code exchange for Google/LinkedIn (were 501 stubs). Created GCP OAuth client. Fixed 4 sub-issues: callback URL paths, cookie domain mismatch (HMAC-signed state), reCAPTCHA survival, redirect_uri mismatch. Commits 91b7f021 + 3bb4dbef + 30e209eb + 0fdcecfc.

task: Wire dashboard WelcomeHeader to live API data
notes: WelcomeHeader now displays real user name, plan tier, and account status from /api/auth/me endpoint. Commit 1941e9d9.

task: Onboarding profile page: dark theme + pre-fill from OAuth + optional fields
notes: Rewrote Profile.tsx with dark theme (bg-slate-900), white text, pre-fills name/email from auth context, email read-only, all fields optional. Commit 9c4b42bc.

task: Smart trial button: check auth status before redirect
notes: Trial buttons (3 instances) now redirect to /dashboard when authenticated or /auth/register when not. Button text updates dynamically. Commit 2924c83a.
verification_commands: Manual review: trial button behavior when logged in vs out

task: Send login email notification for all providers (Google/LinkedIn/email)
notes: send_login_notification was only called for email/password login. Added to Google and LinkedIn login endpoints via BackgroundTasks. All notifications go to capecontrol.app@gmail.com. Commit 2924c83a.
verification_commands: Login via Google/LinkedIn and verify email received

task: Exempt OAuth callbacks from DDoS burst detection
notes: OAuth flow triggered burst attack detection. Exempted /api/auth/oauth/*/callback paths. Raised burst limit 30→50. Commit 0fdcecfc.

task: Fix dashboard stuck in read-only preview mode
notes: Onboarding Welcome set cc_preview_mode in localStorage but never cleared it. Dashboard now clears preview mode when user is authenticated. Also added SPA fallback blocking for .php/.asp/.env probe requests (return 404 instead of 200). Commit b1ff94a1.
verification_commands: Login and visit /app/dashboard (should not show read-only)

task: Replace scaffold route stubs with Navigate redirects and real LogoutAction
notes: Replaced 8 auth/settings scaffold routes with <Navigate> redirects to canonical routes. Added LogoutAction component using useAuth().logout(). Removed unused RequireMvpGuest/RequireMvpAuth imports. Kept 4 content-only stubs (MvpAbout/MvpDocs/MvpHelp/MvpKnowledgeBase). Commit a6de8453.
verification_commands: Visit /login → should redirect to /auth/login; visit /logout → should sign out

task: Enable payments feature flag by default (opt-out pattern)
notes: Changed payments flag from opt-in (=== true) to opt-out (!== false) matching dashboardV2 pattern. Billing/checkout routes now visible by default. Commit a6de8453.
verification_commands: Visit /app/billing — should render without setting env var

notes: Marked §3.3 Session Guarantees and §3.4 Frozen vs Flexible as FROZEN with evidence references. Removed from Frozen-but-Incomplete table. Commit a6de8453.
